title: 7mesh springs into 2021 with new jerseys, chamois and neck covers
content:
If you’re a fan of simple, light riding gear 7mesh has just announced a few new pieces that are definitely worth checking out. The brand’s Spring 2021 collection features men’s and women’s T-shirt style jerseys, plus lightly padded undershorts in a boxer short cut for men and a brief style for women. They’ve also released […]

The post 7mesh springs into 2021 with new jerseys, chamois and neck covers appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
